relnotes.name: Bluetooth Manager

defect.title: .esk and .cmi files do not have header

relnotes.defect: Added copyright headers

defect.title: BTRomConfig Tests Fail in SymTB9.2

relnotes.defect: Subcase 4 of BtRomConfigRSocket001 and subcases 17 and 23 of BtRomConfigUser002 removed as they are duplicates.

defect.title: PREQ1760 Outstanding changes on L2CAP

relnotes.defect: Some L2CAP work was outstanding post-PREQ1760 submission.

defect.title: Failures in BtIncRomConfig tests for AVCTP

relnotes.defect: Updated BTIncRomConfig tests to explicitly specify socket type when opening AVCTP sockets.

defect.title: [Lisbon] Previous PIN code length should not be enforced for new pairing

relnotes.defect: Updated BTTextNotifiers to present recommended minimum PIN code length to user if available, and TBTNotifiersText to use updated TBTPinCodeEntryNotifierParams constructor.

defect.title: [ONB Coverity] CLEANUP_STACK error in SDAP test

relnotes.defect: Corrections to clarify SDAP test code

defect.title: Correct filename checker failures in BT examples

relnotes.defect: Corrections for GCCXML building

defect.title: Create regression tests for BT pairing

relnotes.defect: Auto Notifiers adapted for new pairing tests

defect.title: BtIncRomConfigPan001 1 passed, 1 failed on vFuture

relnotes.defect: Modified pan001.cfg so the bt_inc_romconfig_pan_001.script test works.

defect.title: Errors in SDP reported by tool SDP Record Verified

relnotes.defect: Modified testcase to follow 'LEAVE' coding standard.

defect.title: Bt(Inc)RomConfigPan001 should point ced at the right path

relnotes.defect: Ced path corrected for ROM config tests

defect.title: Copyright failures in bluetooth source build tests

relnotes.defect: Removal of hci unit tests

defect.title: Possible stack overflow in bttextnotifier

relnotes.defect: Changed parameters of CBTManDeviceScanner::AddDiscoveredDeviceL and CBTManDeviceScanner::SetupDeviceParams to pass by const reference

defect.title: Panic in Text Notifiers

relnotes.defect: Introduced if (iGetAuthFromConsole) statement from previous fix in upf27

defect.title: TextNotifiers for PanNAP generating warnings

relnotes.defect: Removed source of compiler warnings in PAN notifiers

defect.title: LinkMgr panics when setting automatic sniff mode on connected socket

relnotes.defect: BTTestConsole - extended link mode display to indicate auto-sniff status

defect.title: Copyright test failures

relnotes.defect: Removed autogenerated UID from Source Control

defect.title: Filename case check failures in source build and test

relnotes.defect: Corrected filenames to enable building of Symbian OS in Linux

defect.title: UPF26: Inquiry started automatically when bonding

relnotes.defect: Closing an instance of RHostResolver that was not previously closed.

defect.title: Non-compliant code added to example application

relnotes.defect: Updated RegUI example app to correct the inheritance for CLocalDeviceUser

defect.title: Non-compliant code added to example application

relnotes.defect: Updated RegUI example app to correct the inheritance for CLocalDeviceUser

defect.title: Pan-Shared: Regressions on AV tests since submissions of INC101724 and its prop'

relnotes.defect: Amending BTAutoNotifiers, as they did not complete passed messages in some scenarios, which could result in deadlock in calling client.

defect.title: LinkfourApp test code fails to build for 9.3 & 9.4 tests

relnotes.defect: Removed out of date example application Linkfour from the Bluetooth socket example code.

defect.title: HCI: RemoteNameReqCompleteEvent supplies spurious characters on end of device na

relnotes.defect: New menu option added to the Bluetooth Test Console to enable the ability to query the name of the remote device on a connection.
